item.title: This Emotional Song From Les Miserables Will Make You Cry Uncontrollably!
item.description: Introduction Les Miserables is one of the most beloved musicals of all time It tells the story of a group of people struggling to survive in 19th century France The musical has been a hit for decades, and it has been adapted into several movies and plays One of the most memorable songs from the musical is “On My Own”, which will make you cry uncontrollably Overview of Les Miserables Les Miserables is a musical by Claude-Michel Schonberg and Alain Boublil.
